original_text: So Ahab went off to eat and drink, but Elijah climbed to the top of Carmel, bent down to the ground and put his face between his knees.
korean_text: 아합이 먹고 마시러 올라가니라 엘리야가 갈멜 산 꼭대기로 올라가서 땅에 꿇어 엎드려 그의 얼굴을 무릎 사이에 넣고

sentences.original_text: So Ahab went off to eat and drink
but Elijah climbed to the top of Carmel
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 엘리야는 갈멜 산 꼭대기로 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and put his face between his knees
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 얼굴을 무릎 사이에 넣었습니다
